name: Rawson's Chicken
description:
This game was created by MadGames, an indie collective formed by Felipe Hernández and javier Roldán.

Rawson opens a butter chicken restaurant in Tika Masala City. For his grand oppeing, he makes a new special recipe, a butter chicken so good, that your sould will leave your body, but after adding his special ingredient, the Zpecial Zpice, his costumers turn into the army of the undead, trying to eat him, and all his delicious chicken.

Controls:

- WASD: Movement

- Space: Dash

- Q: Attack

- Click: Place towe

Additional Information:

We plan on developing this game further. We think that the idea could ahve more potential outside of these 48 hours of development. We plan on implementing:

- Tower Upgrades

- Higher Quality Cutscenes

- Higher Quality Sound Effects
